comment_body: Hi dog lovers: >!there is implied dog harm; sorry for that. Noah and Mr. Ashta are not good people.!<
I don't get it. Is it a werewolf thing or?
>!Mr. Ashta is able to talk to dogs (at a distance, apparently). That's the only supernatural thing. Noah and the dog are normal. But Noah is dealing with an annoyance rather harshly.!<
